ai-tha-ap65:1.1_0: “It’s on the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap65:1.3_0: The nails of the army, having no food,
ai-tha-ap65:3.1_0: Whoever has faith in the Realized One,
ai-tha-ap65:3.4_0: He doesn’t go to a bad place.
ai-tha-ap65:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap65:5.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap65:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap65:6.2_0: Without the buttocks if they do not.
ai-tha-ap65:6.3_0: While the seventeenth day they saw
ai-tha-ap65:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pācīna.
ai-tha-ap65:9.1_0: The third opposite (seeing) to the Elders,
